title: How to unlock your Mystery Champion

replies.body:
What If Your Too Young For Facebook Huh?
Answer That One _**Riot Please**_ Make It **Eligible For Everyone**!

league has an age limit too (13), if you're too young for facebook (age limit of 13) you're too young for league... 

the real question is, why do you even have a league account..

Oh if you change the first part of the url from "oce" to "na" it works :^)

Read this again

We expect to ship out the Mystery Champions by July 1
What if you own all the champions? O.O
Do you get Tahm?
If you own all the champions you will get a mystery skin instead.
Is it actually common for people to own all the champions? Last I checked owning every champ cost like 750,000 IP and was practically unobtainable without paying hundreds?
Play lots, thats all u need.
http://wasted-on-lol.com/stats/oce/kingdingus/
http://wasted-on-lol.com/stats/oce/thecynicalone/ :D
Dang man almost 4000hours, That's insane..... Diamond V gee wiz id like to see u play. Perhaps i could learn something.{{champion:19}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:53}}

Yeah I got the math further down.
i am about to get my last champ it is a reachable goal just need to play alot, i have about 1500 wins in norms and a few hundred ranked
i own all the champs it only took me like 2 seasons to do so but i do own like all the runes as well xD
With all runes and all champs the price is over 1m IP lol xD it takes literally one year straight to earn minimum if you were to never sleep, eat or use the bathroom.
if you own all of the champ you get a mystery skin if you own all of the skins (no one in their right mind) you get 490 rp
everytime i click the link given it comes up with 404 error

Open up League and in the social tab (chat) on the bottom right hand there is a tab that says 'add friend' click that and follow prompts
=)

Me and my friends where discussing Tahm being announced so close to Ekko's release.
Long story short, we all really hope Riot games keeps making new champions frequently. :D so yeah, please do Riot
So I just tried to receive my mystery champ and it didn't work for me :( WHY RITO< WHY????!

Just wanted to be the first to comment.
